content.10: Also I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and led you forty years through the wilderness, to possess the land of the Amorite.
content.11: And I raised up of your sons for prophets, and of your young men for Nazarites.
content.12: But ye gave the Nazarites wine to drink; and commanded the prophets, saying, Prophesy not.
content.13: Behold, I am pressed under you, as a cart is pressed
content.14: Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:
